Package edu.bu.pas.othello.game

Class Game.GameView

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.othello.game.LogicalBoard
edu.bu.pas.othello.game.Game.GameView
Enclosing class:
Game
public static class Game.GameView extends LogicalBoard
A read-only data structure "view" into a Game instance. The purpose of this class is to prevent Agents from being able to access the mutable Game instance. This class contains deep copies of a subset of the information a Game instance has, and serves only to provide useful information about the state of the game to Agent instances.
See Also:
  • PlayerType
  • Coordinate

    • isInBounds

      public final boolean isInBounds(Coordinate c)
      A method to calculate whether or not a specified Coordinate location is a valid coordinate on the map. This will return true iff the x and y coordinates are both between [0, 8).
      Specified by:
      isInBounds in class LogicalBoard
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate to test.
      Returns:
      true iff both the Coordinate's x and y values are between [0, 8).
